title.narrative: Nepal Health Sector Programme III - Implementation

description.narrative: This activity (Nepal Health Sector Programme III - Implementation) is a component of Nepal Health Sector Programme III reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £21,111,679. This component benefits Nepal, and works in the following sector(s): Health policy and administrative management, Basic health care. , with the following implementing partners: Options Consultancy Services. The start date is 16-07-2016 and the end date is 31-12-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
